text:
e="preserve">Richard Feagler (July 29, 1938 – July 1, 2018) was an American journalist, playwright and television personality. He was born in Cleveland, Ohio. He entered journalism in 1963, writing obituaries for the "Cleveland Press". In 1970 Feagler started a regular feature column that continued until the "Press" closed in 1982. He won a Peabody Award in 1991. He was the host of "Feagler & Friends", a weekly half-hour discussion program on WVIZ until 2013.
Feagler died July 1, 2018 in Cleveland, Ohio, aged 79.
